data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Aditya Infotech Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from August 05 2025 the equity shares of Aditya Infotech Ltd  (Scrip Code: 544466) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250804-  dated August 04 2025.
